name: Indie vibes
description:
Indie vibes is more than a game, it's an interactive trip with your virtual friends, your voxel amiga and cool musics!

Explore the Voxel villa and listen to 6 relaxing tracks of Stailer and Magmavander

Use arrows and mouse to move
esc to quit, change langage (french/english) and volume
Use jukebox to change music

Discover the secret place!

Amiga / Pc quality : low or high quality shadows

Stailer :
https://soundcloud.com/stailer

Magmavander :
https://soundcloud.com/magmavander
